title: Looking for t206 lot / ft - 53 and 54 topps set

posts.post_title: Looking for t206 lot / ft - 53 and 54 topps set
posts.post_content:
53 Topps Complete set. Trade Value at 3500
54 Topps set at 2800

looking for t206 lot

Looking to trade them as a single lot.

[IMG]https://s32.postimg.org/xmhnanpl1/image.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]https://s32.postimg.org/h0031kwn9/53_2.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]https://s32.postimg.org/8j564ehc5/53_3.jpg[/IMG]



[IMG]http://s32.postimg.org/5l82bjxr9/54hank.jpg[/IMG]

Dont have much of the 54 set scans. Some big cards have been graded. Ted williams 250 is PSA 4, #1 is PSA authentic cause someone trimmed it. Looks really sharp. I'd say condition wise, it's a VG+ set.

looking for t206 lot
